intro: Verbesina oligocephala, commonly known as the yellow crownbeard, is a flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. It is characterized by its bright yellow ray florets and dark brown disk flowers, which make it visually striking. The plant belongs to the family Asteraceae, also known as the daisy or sunflower family. Its leaves are alternate, lance-shaped, and often covered in fine hairs. Verbesina oligocephala typically grows in moist, disturbed soils and is often found in wetlands or along stream banks.
